sentences.sentence: The lizards were able to manage all three tasks with ease, matching the performance of tits in similar tests.
sentences.translation: 这些蜥蜴很容易就完成了所有三项任务，与山雀在类似测试中的表现不相上下。

sentences.sentence: Long-tailed tits often choose a variety of sites in which to build their nests - where did you find yours?
sentences.translation: 该山雀通常选择各种各样的地方建立巢穴，您是在那里发现的？

sentences.sentence: The lizards were able to manage all three tasks with ease—matching the performance of tits in similar tests.
sentences.translation: 蜥蜴能轻松地完成三项任务—在相同测试中与山雀的表现不分伯仲。
